title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, Phi-3, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client/SDK for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; chat, stream, and pull models from Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents, retrieval, and tool use.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, file upload, multimodal, admin panel) – self-host in Docker.

title: ollama-hack
summary: Collection of example scripts and mini-tools for extending Ollama (vision, voice, RAG, etc.).

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma; ingest PDFs and chat with them locally.

title: ollama-tools
summary: Community repo cataloging function-calling examples (weather, shell, GitHub, Slack) for Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Tauri desktop app wrapping Ollama; cross-platform binary with tray icon and chat window.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to chat with Ollama models inside the editor; generate, refactor, or explain code.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Streamlit chatbot starter that supports multiple Ollama models, history, and parameter tuning.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLMs via Ollama for summarizing notes, brainstorming, and Q&A.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, streaming, embeddings, and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code completer for VS Code with minimal latency.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that chats, generates images, and answers questions using Ollama backends.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Cross-platform Qt6 desktop client for Ollama with chat history, markdown, and model manager.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app + REST API that exposes Ollama models with rate-limiting, auth, and admin analytics.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced CLI wrapper for Ollama with interactive prompts, output formatting, and shell integration.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API with Tokio and Serde.
